metadata.title: CVE-2019-13508 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeTDS through 1.1.11 has a Buffer Overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetds-bin - 1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1
freetds-common - 1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1
libct4 - 1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1
libsybdb5 - 1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1
tdsodbc - 1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetds package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.00.82-2ubuntu0.1').
